minecarttweaks.cant_link_to_engine: You can't make the caboose the engine of the engine!
death.attack.minecarttweaks.minecart: %s didn't look both ways before crossing the rail line
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.title: Cammie's Minecart Tweaks
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.useCampfir: [Client Only] - Should Furnace Minecarts produce Campfire Smoke particles?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.dontEatEnc: [Client Only] - Prevent Furnace Minecarts from burning Enchanted items?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.playerView: [Client Only] - Should the player's view be locked when riding a Minecart?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.maxViewAng: [Client Only] - Maximum view angle if the player's view is locked
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.furnaceMax: [Server Only] - Maximum time a Minecart Furnace can run (in ticks)
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.canLinkMin: [Server Only] - Can Minecarts be Linked by Chains?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.shouldPowe: [Server Only] - Should Powered Rails Stop Furnace Minecarts?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.furnacesCa: [Server Only] - Should Furnace Minecarts be able to use all fuels?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.furnaceMin: [Server Only] - Should Furnace Minecarts be able to load chunks?
minecarttweaks.midnightconfig.toolsHarve: [Server Only] - Can tools harvest Minecarts with blocks in them?
